text:
Brahmaji is the great grandfather of all of us.
 Hence his appearance must match his status.
 Since antiquity, in a single day of Brahmaji no one knows how many members of creatures take birth and die.
 The period since antiquity can be calculated according to astrology.
 Since Brahmaji has such an eternal existance, his appearance must correspondend to his eternity as well, so that feeling of respect could naturally arise among the people for him.
 Hence, Lord Brahma is shown with a white beard.
title: White Beard of Brahmaji
